import "../css/convert.css"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; function Convert() { let [money, setMoney] = useState(0); function convertMoney() { let dollar = document.getElementById("dollar").value; setMoney(82.44 * dollar); } return (
$ {money} ₹
$ {money} ₹
); } export default Convert;
